meta_description: Cape Cod Museum of Art features artwork from Cape Cod's finest artists - past and present. Exhibitions, classes, events and more.

508-385-4477 

​

GENERAL MUSEUM ADMISSION

Adults: $15  
Seniors, 62+: $12

Age 21 and Younger: Free

Members: Free

NARM members: Free

Open Year round!

​

Tues \- Sat from 10 am - 4 pm

Sun from 12 pm - 4 pm

​

First Thursday of each month:

Artfull Thursdays: 10 am - 7pm

Free admission from 4 pm to 7 pm

The Museum is closed on  
all major holidays

​​​

​​​​

Need Directions?

Docents are available each week during these times:

Tuesdays: 11 am - Noon

Wednesdays: 2 - 3 pm

Thursdays: 11 am - Noon

Fridays: 2 - 3 pm  
Saturdays: 1 - 2 pm  
Sundays: 1 - 2 pm

# Coming Up at CCMoA

  * [PAINT NIGHT! Paint the Collection with Michael Giaquinto](https://www.ccmoa.org/events/paint-night-paint-the-collection-with-michael-giaquinto-1-28)

Friday, January 16, 2026, from 6:00 - 8:00 pm. Join us for Paint Night! Each month highlights a different artwork from our Permanent Collection. Led by Michael Giaquinto, this unique museum experience inspires curiosity, creativity, and connection.

[Details](https://www.ccmoa.org/events/paint-night-paint-the-collection-with-michael-giaquinto-1-28)

  * [Elizabeth Miya Jones](https://www.ccmoa.org/events/elizabethmiyajones)

Sunday, January 18, 2026, from 4:00 - 5:00 pm Elizabeth Miya Jones plays cello sonatas by Poulenc and Prokofiev.

[REGISTER](https://www.ccmoa.org/events/elizabethmiyajones)

  * [The MERCY Band](https://www.ccmoa.org/events/themercyband)

Sunday, January 25, 2026, from 4:00 - 5:00 pm Enjoy an afternoon of classic rock music from the soundtrack of your life. Have MERCY and have a good time. 

[REGISTER](https://www.ccmoa.org/events/themercyband)

[See All Events](https://www.ccmoa.org/upcoming-events)

[See All Classes](https://www.ccmoa.org/adult-classes)
